ComicInfo.Summary:
Just four stories this prog as there's a double-helping of Damnation Station.

Judge Dredd - Ferals (part 3) (Emma Beeby - John Burns)Brass Sun - The Diamond Age (part 11) (Ian Edginton - INJ Culbard)Flesh - Badlanders (part 11) (Pat Mills - James McKay and Lee Townsend)Damnation Station - The Howling Beast on the Borderline (part 3 - final part) (Al Ewing - Mark Harrison)
